amendment.description: Amendment sought to require NASA to terminate its partnership with the Russian Government in the International Space Station program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 and printed in the Congressional record to terminate all contracts necessary to remove the Russian Government as a partner in the International Space Station Program but allows NASA to participate with the Russian Government, entities, or contractors on a commercial basis.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roemer amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 117 - 313 (Roll no. 136).
